description:
Lucky Lab is a lifestyle coffee shop brand that is quickly expanding in the Austin and surrounding area markets.  We have a serious passion for good coffee and happy pups! In growing our brand we are looking to add a social media manager + content creator to our talented team.  You will be responsible for creating effective and beautiful communication in a variety of media, including, but not limited to digital, video, photography, and whatever other crazy ideas you come up with. 

A look at your day-to-day - after all YOU are running this department!
  • Lead brainstorms, concept, collaborate and present innovative and exciting creative that garner buy-in while netting measurable results
  • Lead the creative on building out all social media channels, including creating a content calendar, sourcing content, finalizing content and copy, etc.
  • Be able to work collaboratively with the marketing team to create exciting and compelling campaigns
  • Be a steward of and maintain the Lucky Lab Coffee brand in all creative concepts created in-house
  • Must be a team player, able to work within budgets and tight deadlines on multiple campaigns in a fast-paced environment, while maintaining a service-oriented attitude
  • Creative evolution – stay up to date with branding, social and advertising in all mediums
  • Photography and video post-production and editing
  • Love dogs, people, coffee and community!


Now for a little bit about you….
  • Experienced with consumer product brands
  • Experienced with creative content on social media platforms
  • Experienced with content analytics - ability to interpret content analytics and apply takeaways that inform strategy
  • Experienced with writing compelling copy - a storyteller!
  • Experience in hosting, building an agenda and present concepts and campaigns to key stakeholders for final approval
  • Strategic thinker with the ability to solve problems, even when they are not fully defined
  • Video and photography skills
  • Ability to present and sell creative ideas
  • Expertise in Creative Suite, all social media platforms and ability to learn new software, as needed
  • Mac user with own computer/tablet
  • Mostly onsite position (~20-25 hrs a week onsite)
  • 2 or more years of direct social media and content creation work
  • Goal oriented with high standards for excellence


Please email your resume and portfolio to to courtney@luckylabcoffee.com.
